The Psalms of David in meter fitted to the tunes used in parish-churches / by John Patrick ... Patrick, John, 1632-1695. Sternhold, Thomas, d. 1549. Hopkins, John, d. 1570.

Printed for A. and J. Churchill ... and L. Meredith ..., London : 1694.
Includes index. Imperfect: pages 23-24 lacking; beginning to page 37 from defective Bodleian Library copy spliced at end. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
